headline: PPL Capital Funding, Inc. announces pricing of $1 billion of 3.000% Exchangeable Senior Notes
summary: PPL Capital Funding, Inc. ("PPL Capital Funding"), a wholly-owned subsidiary of PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL), announced today the pricing of $1 billion aggregate principal amount of its 3.000% Exchangeable Senior Notes due 2030 (the "notes") in a private placement (the "offering") to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"). PPL Capital Funding also granted the initial purchasers of t
